cause.description:
we all know how the exchange rate in europe is unfair to all us australians, so help out simon by donate any loose change to his wonderful and difficult cause
1. Pat Dennis (manager)
2. James Cush (DQP Funds manager)
3. Tim Cox (PR and marketing)
cause.mission: fund simons DQP expenses on his trip throughout europe
cause.name: Simon Dennis' European DQP Quest
